description: Manages information center log configuration on HUAWEI CloudEngine switches.

log_enable.description: Indicates whether log filtering is enabled.

log_buff_size.description: Specifies the maximum number of logs in the log buffer. The value is an integer that ranges from 0 to 10240. If logbuffer-size is 0, logs are not displayed.

channel_id.description: Specifies a channel ID. The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 9.

state.description: Determines whether the config should be present or not on the device.

log_buff_enable.description: Enables the Switch to send logs to the log buffer.

log_time_stamp.description: Sets the timestamp format of logs.

module_name.description: Specifies the name of a module. The value is a module name in registration logs.
